item.title: 观看：日本央行采取历史性举措，结束了长达八年的负利率政策，开启了该国货币政策的新纪元
item.description:
WATCH: In a historic move, Japan's central bank ended eight years of negative interest rates, ringing in a new era of monetary policy in the country https://t.co/cIJSyXw6AM pic.twitter.com/S9Ska0LOhn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 19, 2024

item.title: 观看：利伯伦资本的约阿希姆-克莱门特（Joachim Klement）解释了为什么欧洲的消费需求会在今年复苏，因为近几个月来购物者一直在努力应对飙升的通胀和较高的借贷成本。
item.description:
WATCH: Joachim Klement of Liberum Capital explains why the consumer demand in Europe, which has been weak in recent months as shoppers struggle with soaring inflation and higher borrowing costs, could recover this year, and why Inditex and Zalando are best placed to benefit pic.twitter.com/qPZErhHnYh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 19, 2024

item.title: 观看：英伟达（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在公司年度开发者大会上宣布了一系列消息，旨在保持这家芯片制造商在人工智能行业的主导地位。
item.description:

item.title: 日本央行结束了长达八年的负利率政策及其他非正统政策的残余，实现了历史性的转变，不再专注于通过数十年的大规模货币刺激来重新刺激经济增长
item.description:
The Bank of Japan ended eight years of negative interest rates and other remnants of its unorthodox policy, making a historic shift away from a focus of reflating growth with decades of massive monetary stimulus https://t.co/WtvfjFoXtE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 19, 2024

item.title: 观看：华尔街主要股指周一收盘上涨，Alphabet 和特斯拉等大型成长股支撑了科技股重仓股纳斯达克指数的反弹，同时投资者也在焦急地等待美国联邦储备委员会本周的会议。
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street's main indexes closed higher on Monday, with megacap growth stocks such as Alphabet and Tesla supporting a rebound in the technology-heavy Nasdaq while investors also waited anxiously for the US Federal Reserve's meeting this week https://t.co/jAMOBpiuzD pic.twitter.com/EM2mSWQt8S

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 为推动可持续交通发展，总部位于迪拜的 Lootah 生物燃料公司回收使用过的烹饪油来生产生物柴油
item.description:
In a push to boost sustainable transportation, Dubai-based Lootah Biofuels recycles used cooking oil to produce biodiesel pic.twitter.com/moy0zcyrJp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 观看：视力受损的尼日利亚人凯欣德-奥卢图博森（Kehinde Olutubosun）是一名地理和动物爱好者，由于没有智能手机，他在查找信息时十分困难。但这种情况正在改变，这要归功于一款人工智能手机，它可以离线工作
item.description:
WATCH: Visually impaired Nigerian Kehinde Olutubosun is a geography and animal enthusiast who struggled to find information because he has no smartphone. But that's changing, thanks to an AI-powered mobile phone that works offline https://t.co/HLYr7YtUgP pic.twitter.com/jK7sMT2v8s

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：当一家投资银行消失时会发生什么？这是一年前瑞信倒闭时金融界面临的问题。@peter_tl 不禁要问，当活动回暖时，幸存者是否会更负责任 #BVTV
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: What happens when an investment bank disappears? That was the question facing the financial world a year ago as Credit Suisse collapsed. @peter_tl wonders whether the survivors will be more responsible when activity picks up https://t.co/cWUrl5ld5C #BVTV pic.twitter.com/7W3NJYCEvl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 观看：纳斯达克遭遇技术故障。该问题与连接和股票订单有关，持续了两个多小时
item.description:
